english.segment1: Lead: God is God and he wont (change). Choir: Oh God is God_ and he wont change. He can do again what he did before_. Hes the same yesterday and forever more --- change  change
english.segment2: Lead: God is a lawyer and he wont (change). Choir: Oh God is a lawyer and he wont change. He can do again what he did before. Hes the same yesterday and forever more --- change  change
english.segment3: Lead: God is a doctor and he wont (change). Choir: Oh God is a doctor and he wont change. He can do again what he did before. Hes the same yesterday and forever more --- change  change
english.segment4: Lead: God is my provider and he wont (change). Choir: Oh God is my provider and he wont change. He can do again what he did before. Hes the same yesterday and forever more --- change  change (repeat)
english.segment5: Vamp. He wont change --- He wont change
